name: Octomize
tag_list: online, self-service, 24-7, appointment, appointments, scheduling, scheduler, schedule, calendar, appointment-book, planning, planner, service, e-commerce, website-hosting, business-meeting, time-slots, information-technology, software
overview:
Octomize.com is a privately-held company headquartered in San Jose, California. Their goal is to provide small businesses with a solution to the tedious problem of appointment scheduling.

Their main product is the Octomize Scheduler - an online self-service appointment scheduling system that allows for small businesses not to have to rely on appointment books and handwritten assignments. Customers are able to sign up for appointments with these businesses at online websites for any time slot that is convenient for them, and not need to deal with waiting to schedule with a secretary during business hours. The Octomize package also includes e-commerce services so that customers may both schedule an appointment and purchase a product at the same time.
